author: Yuhua Wang
title: Asians are stereotyped as ‘competent but cold.’ Here’s how that increases backlash from the coronavirus pandemic.
description: Leaders can make this better — or worse.
content: Asian Americans are, on average, the highest-income, best-educated and fastest-growing minority group in the United States, according to a survey by the Pew Research Center, which was designed to contain a nationally representative sample of each of the six l… [+6935 chars]
